items.title: File & Buffer Operations
items.description: Commands for working with files, buffers, and windows

notes: Use :Mason to install LSP servers. In lspconfig ‚â•0.2, tsserver is renamed to ts_ls.
File explorer: <Space>e. Fuzzy finder: <Space>f?. Buffers: Shift+h/l.
Diagnostics in a floating window: <Space>d; jump with [d and ]d.
Vim Modes: Normal (default), Insert (i), Visual (v), Visual Line (V), Visual Block (Ctrl+v).
Multiline editing: Use Ctrl+v to select block, then I/A to insert at start/end of each line.
Macros: qa to record, q to stop, @a to replay. Use @@ to repeat last macro.
Text objects: iw (inner word), aw (around word), i" (inside quotes), a) (around parentheses).
Search & Replace: :%s/old/new/g replaces all in file, :s/old/new/g replaces all in line.
Visual Block: Select column with Ctrl+v, then use I, A, c, r, d for block operations.
